author: kfogel
msg: * www/project_status.html: Mark 1.0.0 as done, start 1.0.1 and 1.1.

author: kfogel
msg: (rep_lines_res): Tweak to handle 1.0.0, fix some comments.

author: kfogel
msg: * CHANGES: Tweak 1.0.0-beta1 entry to be for 1.0.0.

author: kfogel
msg: This may be a bit more steps than actually necessary, but the point is
I know them all, and this way don't have to think in a hurry about all
the ramifications of releasing directly from branches/1.0.x/.  Since
Slashdot announced our 1.0 early, I'm just trying to get the thing out
the door as quickly (yet safely) as possible.
